channel.title: debian kvm whonix & qubes-whonix
channel.description: it is better to be safer to use debian kvm whonix or qubes-whonix? because I have a problem with the driver acpi. and how to change the language in pidgin on whonix -ws&

item.title: debian kvm whonix & qubes-whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Pidgin is discouraged. ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Chat#Pidgin )

Recommended is Tor Messenger. ( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Chat#Tor_Messenger )

userwhonix:

and how to install anti-virus clam . what is your attitude toward clam?

Antivirus (detection) is the least important tool in securing (hardening) your computer. Details:

https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Computer_Security_Education#Malware

Read full topic

the beginning
env LC_MESSAGES=zh_CN.UTF-8…” - I use qubes-whonix to whonix-ws set pidgin, where do I find the file you want to change?
and how to install anti-virus clam . what is your attitude toward clam?

item.title: debian kvm whonix & qubes-whonix
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

Depending on your host, both KVM based Whonix and Qubes-Whonix deliver a similar level of protection though, due to the design of Qubes, it is to recommend over most other hosts.

userwhonix:

and how to change the language in pidgin on whonix

The same way you’d do on other Debian based systems: https://pidgin.im/pipermail/support/2012-January/024775.html

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
